titleStmt.title: A piece of Friar Bacons brazen-heads prophesie. By William Terilo

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for Arthur Iohnson, dwelling in Powles Church-yard, at the signe of the white Horse,

notesStmt.note: In verse. On the decline of manners from the Golden Age. Probably by Nicholas Breton--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
